scripts.setfunctionsenv:dev: firebase functions:config:set app.env=development&& npm run getfunctionsenv
scripts.setfunctionsenv:prod: firebase functions:config:set app.env=production&& npm run getfunctionsenv
scripts.prepfunctions:dev: npm run build:server && firebase use default && npm run setfunctionsenv:dev
scripts.prepfunctions:prod: npm run build:server && firebase use prod && npm run setfunctionsenv:prod
scripts.startfunctions:dev: npm run prepfunctions:dev && npm run startfunctions
scripts.startfunctions:prod: npm run prepfunctions:prod && npm run startfunctions
scripts.deploy:dev: firebase use default && npm run setfunctionsenv:dev && firebase deploy -P default --only functions,hosting
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use prod && npm run setfunctionsenv:prod && firebase deploy -P prod --only functions,hosting
scripts.deployfunctions:dev: npm run prepfunctions:dev && firebase deploy -P default --only functions
scripts.deployfunctions:prod: npm run prepfunctions:prod && firebase deploy -P prod --only functions
scripts.deployhosting:dev: npm run build && firebase use default && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting
scripts.deployhosting:prod: npm run build:prod && firebase use prod && firebase deploy -P prod --only hosting
